Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the consolidation of the environmental control board with the office of administrative trials and hearings and replacing the commissioner of consumer affairs with the chief administrative law judge of the office of administrative trials and hearings on the environmental control board and making other changes related thereto.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Consolidation of the environmental control board with the office of administrative trials and hearings.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations

A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the consolidation of the environmental control board with the office of administrative trials and hearings and replacing the commissioner of consumer affairs with the chief administrative law judge of the office of administrative trials and hearings on the environmental control board and making other changes related thereto.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Consolidation of the environmental control board with the office of administrative trials and hearings.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Felder, Recchia, Dickens, Vallone and Seabrook
